pages.text: Battlefields are barren and bloodied swaths of land. You will often encounter $(l:hostile_creatures/dying_soldier)dying soldiers$() here at night. There are many destroyed structures scattered about, and you may find temporary shelter within these.$(br)If you are lucky, you might find a small settlement that will protect you from the dangers of these areas.

Exploring the scattered structures can provide a good source of defense blocks, like bricks and sandbags. In some areas, you might also find loot caches which may have useful resources inside. If you are strong enough to wander the area at night, destroying dying soldiers can provide a steady source of iron musket balls.
